chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: There is a delay in package delivery. Thank you for your help,

Hello, My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: Hello, is my delivery expected to be delivered on May 29? Why is there a delay? Thank you
Thank you for your help,

Hello,

My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:

I haven't received my device yet. The device is supposed to arrive on June 29, 2024. I contacted the shipping company and the seller, but there was no response.

Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Olga - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for assisting the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Files release

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the relevant documents. We will proceed with the investigation and keep you updated. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Olga Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Our system has identified an issue with the customer's address, possibly due to an incomplete address.
Could we kindly ask for your assistance in verifying the shipping address for the upcoming parcel delivery?
Ensuring our customers receive their orders promptly and accurately is our top priority. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

Customer wants the refund !

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and will keep you updated once my logistics partner can confirm that the investigation has been opened.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

I will refund it.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team
